verbose_text: Concerning the phenotypic results in later development, such as muscle fate, our data could be correlated with mouse data where methylation of H3K27 by EZH2 was shown to play an essential role in the repression of muscle specific genes and where the demethylase activity of UTX on H3K27me3 was required to initiate muscle fate.
evidence: UTX on H3K27me3 was required to initiate muscle fate
